titles.title: can you hear the kinsman's cry

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Can you hear the Kinsman's cry
As He's calling forth His bride:
Can you feel the yearning deep within
To draw you to His side:
Are you listening to the voice that says,
In me you shall abide:
Will you go, will you go, will you go
And be made as one? Drawn into the love union
Thy Kinsman calleth now,
Will you go, will you go, will you go?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou shalt pure and holy be,
There shall be no spot in thee.
I will give to thee my Name,
And we'll be one and the same.
Arise, my love, my fair one
For thy Kinsman draweth nigh.
Will you answer when He calls you,
Will you go, will you go,
Will you go and be made as one
Drawn into the love union.
Thy Kinsman calleth now,
Will you go, will you go, will you go?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Is your heart in preparation
For the day that He may call:
To forsake all things behind you
And to give to Him your all:
Are you willing to be covered
And to honor and obey:
When He calls you will you answer,
I will go, I will go,
I will go and be made as one
Drawn into the love union.
Thy Kinsman calleth now,
Will you go, will you go, will you go?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I have heard the Kinsman's cry
Calling forth His perfect bride
I can feel the yearning deep within
To draw her to His side.
I am listening to the voice that says,
In me, you shall abide.
I am ready, I am willing, I will go, I will go,
I will go and be made as one
Drawn into the love union.
My Kinsman calleth now I will go, I will go, I will go.
